es.uam.eps.ir.ranksys.novdiv.reranking

Interface Reranker<U,I>

  • Type Parameters:
    U - type of the users
    I - type of the items
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AlphaBayesRuleReranker, BayesRuleReranker, BinomialCoverageReranker, BinomialDiversityReranker, BinomialNonRedundancyReranker, DitheringReranker, FDItemNoveltyReranker, GreedyReranker, ISDCItemNoveltyReranker, ItemNoveltyReranker, LambdaReranker, MMR, NullReranker, PCItemNoveltyReranker, PDItemNoveltyReranker, PermutationReranker, PM, RandomReranker, RXQuAD, TDItemNoveltyReranker, XQuAD

    public interface Reranker<U,I>
    Re-ranker. Changes the position of items in a recommendation list to optimize criteria other than relevance.
    Author:
    Sa√∫l Vargas (saul.vargas@uam.es), Pablo Castells (pablo.castells@uam.es)

      Recommendation<U,I> rerankRecommendation(Recommendation<U,I> recommendation, int maxLength)
      Re-ranks a recommendation.

    • Method Detail

      • rerankRecommendation

        Recommendation<U,I> rerankRecommendation(Recommendation<U,I> recommendation,
                                         int maxLength)
        Re-ranks a recommendation.
        Parameters:
        recommendation - recommendation to be re-ranked
        maxLength - maximum length of the re-ranking
        Returns:
        a recommendation that is a re-ranking of the input one
